plot: A struggling indie rock band signs a major record deal only to have their album and their career nearly destroyed by the people who signed them.
title: Golden Days
plot_es: A struggling indie rock band signs a major record deal only to have their album and their career nearly destroyed by the people who signed them.
plot_en: A struggling indie rock band signs a major record deal only to have their album and their career nearly destroyed by the people who signed them.
